H0.text: Which type of hat takes its name from an 1894 novel by George Du Maurier where the title character has the surname O'Ferrall . Fedora

H1.text: Which type of hat takes its name from an 1894 novel by George Du Maurier where the title character has the surname O'Ferrall . Homburg

H2.text: Which type of hat takes its name from an 1894 novel by George Du Maurier where the title character has the surname O'Ferrall . Bowler

H3.text: Which type of hat takes its name from an 1894 novel by George Du Maurier where the title character has the surname O'Ferrall . Trilby

A4.text: The hat's name derives from the stage adaptation of George du Maurier's 1894 novel Trilby.
